channel.title: Mission 360
channel.desc: Gary Krause showcases the lives of missionaries who devote their time to explore new places and spread the word of God.

channel.title: The Ultimate Encounter
channel.desc: In this uplifting episode, we explore the truth that happiness is a choice rooted in our relationship with God, not just a fleeting feeling.
